website_summaries.verdict: A good looking chair for a great price. There's just enough design to set them apart from other chairs in the same price range.
pros: Excellent value for the quality of the chair
cons: Not sturdy enough for larger people

customer_reviews.title: Nice product..slightly difficult assembly.
customer_reviews.text: My husband found them very challenging to assemble, but they look nice and seem sturdy. They complimented our table and bar chairs nicely. Look like the picture as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Henwood

customer_reviews.title: Look great but boy are they uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good thing I didn't get these chairs to actually sit on! LOL! They are about the most uncomfortable things ever. The seat is smallish and very, very hard. I got them to put around my dining room table for if and when I ever have company. Ha ha. After trying them, I wouldn't be able to put anybody I really cared about in them. In the meantime, they look great and the price was right. I think if I took the seat covers off and put some actual padding down it might make things better but I'm definitely not going to go to all that trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Carmelene

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: They weren't too terrible to assemble, but, in general, if alan wrenches ceased to exist my feeling wouldn't be hurt. Mine aren't wobbly (yet!) and I haven't had long enough to comment on comfort. They are attractive, BUT, knowing what I know now about the seats, I wouldn't buy again and don't recommend the product. You will have to use different screws and secure the seat in some other fashion that how they're delivered. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Shrkchsr

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed returning customer.
customer_reviews.text: One of the chair back panel came with scratches when it was suppose to be brand new! Very disappointed. I bought these to replace the ones I bought before. The original one I bought years ago have last well and we loved chair. Very disappointed this time.
customer_reviews.author: jade

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stylish, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Overall, we are very happy with these chairs. We bought four to go with a table and bench. I love the contrast of the rich, dark brown wood with the neutral color of the padded seats. The chairs themselves are lightweight, comfortable and stylish. I can’t speak as to how well they will hold up as we’ve had them less than six months, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: NurseLanae

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are really poor quality. The "glue" holding the backs together came ...
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are really poor quality. The "glue" holding the backs together came loose and in less than 30 days the top section separated from the back when pushing or lifting the chair up to scoot it out to sit down. One leg on one of the two in the "set" was shorter than the other so if it's on a hard surface it wobbles - luckily I have an area rug under my table so it's not too noticeable. I would definitely NOT recommend them and will be looking to find replacement chairs that I can actually sit in and test first.
customer_reviews.author: liamsmom

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: The chairs arrived quickly, and in new condition. Assembly was easy, although the tool they included was a bit cumbersome - but I have tools, so I used something better. They're little less comfortable, but beautiful. I'm very pleased with them. However, let's see how long it lasts for me. Wish it could have more polish texture to it.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I had been concerned that they might be a bit flimsy from some of the other reviews but I weigh in the 150s and all my family is there or less and none of us have had issues with this set I've used for 3 months now. Even my friends who are closer to 200 lbs have no issues. If you're on a budget or just don't want to spend a ton on furniture then I'd recommend this for you too (my main use is for me alone but family and friends, including young nephews, visit a few times a month).
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Im loving it!
customer_reviews.text: It surpassed my expectations. At 1st I was a little surprised at how narrow it was when I set it up, but it's very sturdy and the seat is firm which is a plus. So now I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: chairs are nice. The wood that these are made from is ...
customer_reviews.text: Table is wobbly, chairs are nice. The wood that these are made from is very inferior wood. Its very light and very brittle. One chair fell back onto the ground, snapped the top part off. The side of the table got bumped into and piece of would chunked off. Its a very light, very brittle wood that is easy to break. Its a fine table and chairs if you are on a budget and only plan on keeping it for a year or two and dont mind if they break, otherwise you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Baker

customer_reviews.title: Stable, easy assembly, look good
customer_reviews.text: Well packed and quality product that is stable. Beautiful finish. Extremely easy to assemble. They are not plush chairs by any means. However, dining chairs aren't exactly the same as the couch... I recommend these to anyone looking for chairs in a budget price range.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Z

customer_reviews.title: Look great and can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am replacing 4 very expensive Pennsylvania House cherry wood, Queen Ann style chairs as we have downsized and they don't fit around my smaller round table & could not be pushed in. The Coaster chairs were easy to put together and really look nice around my table. Even though the seats are a little harder then my other chairs, we don't mind. Overall, this is a good product and the price is unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced 6 original dining room chairs with 8 of these. Great value!! Hard wood and great look. Did have to drill a hole or 2 per chair-predrilled weren’t 100% accurate, but not hard to do. Just check first. Wife loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B

customer_reviews.title: this is a great chair! I bought a table with my boyfriend ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great chair! I bought a table with my boyfriend and we needed chairs (to replace our fold-up card table chairs!), and we decided to risk it and get these. As it turns out, they match our table almost perfectly! They seem like pretty decent quality chairs. The only negative is that on both of the ones that I've ordered, the screws that hold the cushion part onto the frame of the chair have come loose and fallen out. Both times this happened were after party nights though, so I suspect our guests weren't exactly gentle with our chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Chairs are awesome and I love the set together
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these chairs to go with the Coaster Pedestal Round Dining Table. Chairs are awesome and I love the set together!
customer_reviews.author: KJB

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair - easy to lift - - not for large people
customer_reviews.text: These are nice chairs. Fairly comfortable and nice looking. I am 5'11" and 170 lbs and the chair feels sturdy. However, I would imagine someone with a bigger build and more weight would quickly ware out this chair with regular, repeated use. I would purchase again. Every now and then you may need to tighten the bolts. But, for the money, we have been pleased. If the chairs had been slightly sturdier I would have give 5 stars. For the price range I think the chairs are well made.
customer_reviews.author: jeremiah2911

customer_reviews.title: Easier than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first online furniture purchase and I was a bit nervous. The shipment arrived within 2 days of ordering and the chairs were easily assembled while watching an episode of Walking with the Beasts. I'll admit that they're good looking chairs, but much smaller than I anticipated and the fabric on the chairs is of a lesser quality. Fortunately, with my cost savings, I can easily pick of some fabric and do a quick custom cover of each seat which will result in making the chairs appear far more attractive than the $240 paid (6 chairs). If the size is in question, I highly recommend going to a furniture store for a comparison...it's well worth the trip.
customer_reviews.author: KikiRo

customer_reviews.title: Coaster Contemporary Style Dining Chairs, Cappuccino Wood Finish, Set of 2
customer_reviews.text: The look and design of the chairs are beautiful. The color is great and what I was looking for. The issue is the quality of the onstruction. I am a former furniture dealer. The seat construction is not sturdy enough to hold a large and heavy person. In order to reinforce the entire chair, I have to buy metal "L" brackets to screw to the rear of the chair seats and legs; then buy straight metal strips for the front of the seat to attach to the front legs. That's why I would not recommend purchasing these chairs, other than that, they are a great design and fantastic color.
customer_reviews.author: MRS ELLA HARBISON

customer_reviews.title: Know what you're buying...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of these chairs for staging purposes when I was selling my house. At the time, my priority was not to spend a lot of money, while at the same time showing something that looks nice and I think these chairs fit that bill. However, if you plan on using them regularly, beware that these chairs do not have an extremely sturdy feel about them. I have not broken any of them yet, but I do not use them much. I would recommend these chairs for someone who is not going to use them actively every day or doesn't mind a shorter life than a traditional chair.
customer_reviews.author: pmnef

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Chairs arrived in great condition, no scratches, dings or missing parts. Assembly was a breeze. Although the seat has no pilot hole to start with to secure seat to frame. I just had the wife sit on the seat after I put it in position to hold it in place while I screwed it together from under the chair. Overall a good product and value purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Add Dazzle to Your Dining.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 chairs and they arrived per the shipping schedule. They were undamaged in any way and relatively easy to assemble. They are beautiful chairs and look great with a couple of skirted Parsons chairs at the same table. I would have given 5 stars except two of the holes were missing in one chair to connect the back to the seat so we had to make our own holes. Other than that, everything was fine and I believe they should last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A Powell

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Dining Chairs
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 4 dining room chairs to compliment what we already have and are so happy with what we received. They are beautiful, were well packed, came in perfect condition, arrived more quickly than we expected, are actually comfortable to sit on -- AND they were not expensive; with shipping they came to approximately $50 per chair! We couldn't be happier with them.
customer_reviews.author: ShPH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these chairs. It is really beautiful. Assemblage was a breezy, but I will be definitely replacing the seat cushions. They are really uncomfortable. Seats are also quite small.
customer_reviews.author: Renata

customer_reviews.title: Best Chair look, price, quality, and VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking chairs, very good quality, excellent value. Easy to assemble. Look beautiful - just what we were looking for. Could not be happier with this purchase and quality. Could not find any item anywhere in our area for this quality, look, and VALUE/PRICE. Phil
customer_reviews.author: Phil G.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, dont buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. Don't bother buying. Trying to return due to poor quality of the item and the return was accepted but I have to pay to have them shipped back plus a 20% restock fee. I feel this is ridiculous for chairs that don't even look like they'll last to the new year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken already!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even had the chairs 3 weeks and already 1 broke!!
customer_reviews.author: Darinae S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Chairs for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I had a challenge simply trying to buy from a different vendor. I cancelled that order and purchased these chairs. They look great, relatively easy to put together, sturdy, and look great in my kitchen. Good chairs for the price and am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: msan_msw

customer_reviews.title: Great looking dining chair.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good....good chairs for the price. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Comfort is what's expected for price but the chairs are nice and look good at my table.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Willmert

customer_reviews.title: So worth the price great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs very nice comfortable!!! You can't beat the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chairs, very good quality. I love these and could not be happier with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Charmained

customer_reviews.title: Good chairs for price
customer_reviews.text: Good chairs for price. I initially bought one set. I already had a simple Ikea black table. I only needed chairs. The brown color is dark enough that it looks fine with my black table. I was happy with the chairs size, back support and weight/feel so I bought 3 more sets to have complete set of 8 chairs! Cushion feels like hard foam, not much give or squishy feel, but again- not bad at all for the price!
customer_reviews.author: ghalib manjurr

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 6 chairs. I didn't want to spend a fortune since I have two young kids and anything that is super nice never stays that way. So, these chairs looked great; the price was good; and the reviews were promising. However, 3 of my chairs seem to be coming apart at the top. One chair was toppled by my cat and the the headpiece splintered in two. I would have expected it to not break so easily or at least hold up for about 3 years. Not sure if I would purchase these again although I really love the cushion and the color. Just disappointed in the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 8 and 2 came broken. Not high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Spolsino

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Light.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. I like the microsuede. Chairs are lighter than I expected and easy to move around. Great chairs. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Iu

customer_reviews.title: My beautiful chairs
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, elegant and easy to ensemble. The seats are very hard,is the only thing I am Not so in love with.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs. Good value. Pretty easy to assemble. All pieces were there.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Ross

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking chairs, but once you sit on it, it's not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Chairs, that we can actually put together are ok. Not as study as expected. Company is a nightmare to work with. They shorted us 6 pegs needed to finish putting together and I have spent a week asking for them to send them. I get one email a day asking for a part number. They don't understand they don't have part numbers. They also will not give me a phone number to call and speak with someone. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: shantel osipovitch

customer_reviews.title: Not study at all
customer_reviews.text: Nice and decent but of poor quality kid knocked of one and snapped the top clean off had to gurrela glue it back on
customer_reviews.author: kyler Katka

customer_reviews.title: These chairs were a good price, fairly easy to put together (maybe about ...
customer_reviews.text: These chairs were a good price, fairly easy to put together (maybe about 30 minutes), and look nice. I have been using them for a few months and haven't had any issues with them aside from a few scratches in the floor. If you get these chairs I would recommend also buying pads to protect your floors. They aren't the most comfortable chair in the world but were exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superior value
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, have not found a better deal for chairs then this one. I figured that went I received them they would have been very lightweight and overall fairly poor in quality but for $40 eAch...why not, right? When I easily put them together (approx 15-20 min per chair) the quality was excellent and the weight was still lightweight but far better than I expected. Overall the chairs are exceptional for the price. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Short but Sweet
customer_reviews.text: A little on the short and small side but very pretty and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Webb

customer_reviews.title: So uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are easy to assemble but so uncomfortable. The seating pads are too stiff. I wish I could return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs, sturdy and nice looking. Easy to put together. USPS lost my first 2 boxes so Amazon sent me replacements.
customer_reviews.author: MCTexas

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great price for two great chairs. We bought 3 pairs for a total of 6 chairs to go with our new breakfast table. We really love these chairs. The two chairs come in one flat box with good directions for assembly. Since we use them on tile we added little round pads to the bottoms feet and they are nice and quiet moving them around. Good cushions, great color and fancy backs. Did I say we love them? We really do.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Ross

customer_reviews.title: so that was pretty sweet. These look nice and are relatively easy ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these a full week ahead of schedule, so that was pretty sweet. These look nice and are relatively easy to assemble. My complaint is one of the 4 I ordered came with a deep scratch in the leg. *update* the legs get very wobbly and we haveto tighten them up frequently. We aren't heavy and we don't do anything out of the ordinary with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: -good
customer_reviews.text: Connection to cushion is not working. Guess I will have to super glue them and mess up wood.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Guise

customer_reviews.title: They look nice but when you sit on them the seat is ...
customer_reviews.text: Returning these chairs. They look nice but when you sit on them the seat is very narrow and uncomfortable. We are not big people but these were made for someone very petite. Sears were hard as a rock. Had friends test them also and they had the same reaction. I would not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: h leech

customer_reviews.title: the look good with my furniture so i think they are "keepers"
customer_reviews.text: these chairs were just what i needed for the holidays and beyond. my son put the two i bought in about 20 minutes. the look good with my furniture so i think they are "keepers".
customer_reviews.author: D.l. miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these for a table we repurposed for an eat-in kitchen. Kind of light in weight, but comfortable and seems sturdy enough for our kitchenette.
customer_reviews.author: JayRoam

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased these. The colors were as shown. I purchased 2 chairs and they arrived quickly. My husband had them put together and under our table in a short time. I am very pleased with the quality of these chairs and would likely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Sturdy good-looking chairs. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great price for chairs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for chairs for my new dining table but the chairs at the stores are so expensive for the style that I want. I risked it and bought these. These are very modern looking and exactly the style I was looking for, I bought 6 of them and they are wonderful. Very easy to put together. On top of that, I got it for approximately $35 each chair. They are not for people on the heavier side as it is a slimmer more modern styled chair.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Chan

customer_reviews.title: good looking and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: good looking( looks exactly like the pictures so no surprises when you get the delivery), sturdy. The setting-up could be a bit easier
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking chairs... Cushing's are so hard wish they were more soft... But overall the chairs are nice just those Cushing's needs to be more soft
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, easy to assemble, comfortable, narrow chairs
customer_reviews.text: The two chairs look as nice assembled as they do in the picture. Package includes everything you need for assembly except a phillips head screwdriver. Assembly took about 15 minutes in total. Chairs seem sturdy when assembled. All parts included, and the items were well packaged / arrived without any damage. We use these around a breakfast table that usually seats 4 people but could seat 6. We bought two of them as a trial because they are narrow and would allow for 6 chairs to be placed around the table but still looked comfortable. We will order four more because they exceeded our expectations in comfort and looks.
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfy and great for the price. Just a little smaller than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Cappuccino Chairs
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying our two new Cappuccino chairs very much. Although I've never put a piece of furniture together before, I found it very easy to do so. All the needed hardware was included, and visual instructions were foolproof. They are slim and elegant but even large men are comfortable in them. In fact, I intend to order two more.
customer_reviews.author: Fenway

customer_reviews.title: Good chair for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Good looking chair. Feels sturdy and is easy to assemble. The cushions are stuff and it feels a little odd to sit on but I think they will break in.
customer_reviews.author: Bob D

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs. Great price!!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are very nice. High backs with microfiber seats. I ordered four and assembly was easy and fast. No problems. The look is very elegant. I did spray the seats with scotch guard as microfiber tends to soil quickly. you can't beat the price. 2 chairs come with one order.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered only two at first just to see if I really wanted my dining room table surrounded by these chairs. I was pleasantly surprised to find they arrived very quickly and my husband put them together in no time. I was so impressed that I immediately ordered six more. I had looked at chairs in furniture stores similar to these but for quite a bit more money. They are sturdy enough and all eight of them sit even. The seat covering is a light color but I believe they would be easy enough to recover if they become soiled. I am very happy with my new chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Anne Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, a little on the small side
customer_reviews.text: These chairs work really well for us. I wish I had paid a little more attention to the demensons because they seem a little small but they are beautiful! Easy to put together and maintain. My daughter has spilled so much on the seats and one once over with my steam cleaner attachment and it's like new again. Love them, big thumbs up! Would be 5 stars if they were just a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaB

customer_reviews.title: good looking and takes 1
customer_reviews.text: Light, good looking and takes 1.5 hours to assemble 4 with the tools provided. Drill needed.
customer_reviews.author: Minitechnicus

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: Have had these chairs for less than a year and we already need to replace them. They are broken and/or falling apart. The tops of the chairs have broken off more times than I can count and the legs are all wobbly and falling apart now too. They looked really nice when I first got them, but that didn't last. They still look nice if you can avoid looking at all the broken pieces and lopsided legs. Don't buy these chairs!!!
customer_reviews.author: msm1979

customer_reviews.title: Good chairs for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good chairs for the price. I could never get the seats to stay attached to the chair and are constantly coming off. AS does the top of the chair back. Not well made but like I said you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Kimpton

customer_reviews.title: Good chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs were just what my wife was looking for. They were easy to put together and look great. We thought they look just as they did in the picture on the amazon web site. They seem to be very solid to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a solid good looking set of chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to setup, good looking chairs for an amazingly low price... here in Hawaii we don't have huge options and shipping tends to cost more than what we're buying so it was great to get these with free shipping too. Maybe not the same craftsmanship of something made by hand, but still a well-built chair that is comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Supagruv

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very easy to assemble...my son did it for me!
customer_reviews.text: Nice chairs and easy to put together...my 17 year old did it in a snap. Very happy about this order, as the chairs match a little glass kitchen table that I bought a few years ago perfectly! Would have given them 5 stars, but the chairs are not super substantial/heavy..but great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, stylish dining chairs for the budget challenged
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for dining chairs that combine function and great style for an excellent price, order these chairs. I just finished putting them together and they look great. As a starving college student, who also happens to be a new home owner, my funds are very limited. These chairs are not as substantial as more expensive chairs, but they seem quite sturdy. I highly recommend them for the person starting out who needs to stretch their dollar.
customer_reviews.author: A. Conway

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are great chairs for your family dining room area. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Anurag

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: So Happy with these chairs. They went together easily, all holes lined up and they look great, matching the other two I had bought elsewhere perfectly. And the price, what can I say but thank you. Sincerely E Black
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Too light weight
customer_reviews.text: well, the chair is too light... even ikea stuff would be twice stronger than this.... just assembled it.. not sure its gonna withhold even a person 150 pounds or more... I would not recommend this to anyone. better stop by nearest store and pay the same amount to get something better than this.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made chairs​, for the price you can't go wrong. Solid wood. Delivery was fast and we'll package. You get two in one box, very easy to put together. All you need a screw driver.
customer_reviews.author: len

customer_reviews.title: size is slightly smaller than i would have liked, but overall the chairs are perfect replacements for ...
customer_reviews.text: size is slightly smaller than i would have liked, but overall the chairs are perfect replacements for my dining room
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Decent chairs, seem sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few months ago-- I wanted some dining room chairs that would hold up under normal use with my large in-laws. So far, so good. I set up both chairs in an hour, both were balanced, so they don't rock. They feel sturdy, even after months of use. I have no problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Quirky_Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these chairs are fantastic! VERY Easy assembly, despite what others may say. We got 4 chairs and my husband had them all put together within 30 min. They give you everything you need to assemble them. They were packaged perfectly and arrived in mint condition.They are beautiful chairs and look like you should have spent much more money on them than you actually did. I've gotten nothing but compliments from family and friends. I totally recommend these chairs to anyone buying.
customer_reviews.author: Monroe1

customer_reviews.title: It kinda looks like furniture for preteens
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are very uncomfortable and small. It kinda looks like furniture for preteens. They look nice and are easy to assemble but the quality is cheap and I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but have wood glue handy
customer_reviews.text: The chairs look very nice, but the top wooden part, where you pick up the chair to pull it out, comes out each time. This requires wood glue to keep in place for all 4 chairs.
customer_reviews.author: A5Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful/Stable Chairs
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my first apartment in college. They suit the minimalist/vaguely oriental decor well. They were also easy to put together. They're somewhat smaller than one might expect, however they're fine for me (5' 7, 180). The seat is exactly 18 inches above the ground. The chair is 38 inches tall.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Depends on what you’re looking for
customer_reviews.text: 1. Great for the price 2. Light weight 3. You could guess what the quality is from 1&2
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better in 3D than in the Amazon photos
customer_reviews.text: These chairs look better in 3D than they do in the photos on Amazon. Easy to assemble, and so far the screws are holding nicely. Only (minor) downside: the espresso finish dings pretty easily. Handle with care, tighten the screws every couple of months, and you'll be happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Harris

customer_reviews.title: A Fine Chair
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back, so I must sit with my spine straight up when at the computer, my office desk, or my hobby desk. This chair allows me to do that, comfortably. The chair is sturdy, but not so heavy that it's difficult to move around. The seat cushioning is excellent. Assembly is a snap, with the necessary hex wrench included in the hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton W Davis

customer_reviews.title: But for the price we did get two more chairs which is good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to have additional seating at our formal dining room table. I should have checked out the measurements bc these are very small chairs. They look out of place at the table.. But for the price we did get two more chairs which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Cone

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: The Cappuccino Wood Finish Dining Chair Set is great and looks splendid with my small glass top kitchen table. it really brings out the good looks of the kitchen in a big way. I am very proud of it. It was easy to put together as others have said, and I find the chairs to be very sturdy, unlike what some buyers have said. I would recommend this set to anyone looking for reasonably priced merchandise with high intrinsic value.
customer_reviews.author: ted h

customer_reviews.title: They're nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nice. But wish they are were about an inch or two bigger. But I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Bev S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs were a big surprise. The cost was so low, we did not expect that these chairs would be as nice as they are. The finish is flawless, the styling is chic, and the microfiber seat cushions are a breeze to clean. They were delivered quickly and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Froggy

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very good and instructions clear. Assembly must be done with long allen wrench provided......very tedious and slow going. Seem sturdy enough, but no braces between legs so plan on being careful with them. Fairly comfortable while seat could be a bit larger, but they work. Overall IMO they are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Veridical

customer_reviews.title: I love these chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Goes perfect with the Coaster Pedestal Round Dining Table. I love these chairs, they're comfortable, easy to put together and look very chic. Suede is easy to clean. Make sure when you screw the sitting part together, you screw gently each screw equal pressure. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Chairs...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 chairs. They look great and easy to put together. The seat cushion is kind of hard. They were for my daughters table. She likes them and are good for her first apartmemt.
customer_reviews.author: By the Grace of God

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I received the order super fast...happy about that. The chairs were really easy to put together...took me about 15 minutes...but I was watching tv as I put them together. All I needed was a phillips head screw driver to assemble...all screws and allen wrentches came included. Chairs are very comfortable to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: we didn't like them. Packed right away and returned them
customer_reviews.text: Seats are very narrow, and main concern was cushion which is very thin. As soon as we opened box, we didn't like them. Packed right away and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Good look but not great product
customer_reviews.text: The actual product looks just like the picture - very nice and clean. However, these chairs are extremely light weight, which is something I don't like chairs to be. I felt like a small breeze would tip them over.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: the chairs look great but are lower quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: the chairs look great but are lower quality than expected. Assembly is pretty easy to follow. Some of the cushions I received were different colors of tan than the set of 4 that I ordered from the same company but the seller sent us replacement chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: great quality, great that these are available with prime
customer_reviews.text: great quality, great that these are available with prime. PS buy the felt feet These do not come with them. Other than that these are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: MARIO V

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the original dining room chairs with these and I am so happy! super comfortable and nice looking. I cant speak to their longevity as I have only had them for a couple of weeks but I already ordered the matching barstools. I recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Susan Quealy-Wasser

customer_reviews.title: Super satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs fit perfectly with the decor in the dining area. The size is just right for a small apartment. The chairs look better than in pictures. I was really impressed with the quick delivery of these. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who may be looking to purchase a good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: MBA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Simple
customer_reviews.text: Easily put together and very comfortable. I love how fast that they arrived and that it was really simple to make. The last set of chairs I bought were super complicated and some of the screws didn't fit where they were labeled to go. So these were a nice change.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Lovely chair with great quality. The manual was intuitive and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely chair with great quality. The manual was intuitive and it was easy to assemble by myself. Some reviews mention that the chairs were crooked, but mine was perfect and straight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfirtable
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. I brought these because my original chairs were cheap and came with a cheap table. These chairs are waaaaaay more steady and comfortable. I highly recommend and remember if abused or rough handled they will not last long, so don't blame the company.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Sandra D. Seals

product_meta.title: Gabriel Wheat Back Side Chairs Cappuccino and Beige (Set of 2)
product_meta.description: Pull this comfy chair up to your favorite table to relax and dine in style. Its plush, padded seat is covered in a soft, velvety fabric that's exquisitely pleasing to the touch. Its sturdy, supportive seat back adds an extra level of comfort. Blending deep shades of rich cappuccino with muted tones of beige, this chair gracefully complements various styles of decor. Its bold silhouette and checkered wooden design enhance any dining setup with charm, character, and class.
feature_bullets: Set includes: Two (2) dinning side chairs
Materials: Fabric, Asian hardwood and Asian tropical wood

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars596 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
